title: Global Day of Coderetreat 2014 - Utrecht, Netherlands
description:
Stefan Hendriks and I (Bart Bakker) will host Global Day of Coderetreat 2014. 
On this day thousands of developers from around the globe come together to hone our craft. For more info read the official GDCR announcement (http://archive.coderetreat.org/profiles/blogs/announcing-global-day-of-coderetreat-2014) 
The event in The Netherlands will be held at the Utrecht office of Mirabeau (https://www.mirabeau.nl/contact/locaties/utrecht.html) 
Please RSVP to join us on November 15! 
If you're interested in sponsoring a wonderful group of people spending their free Saturday to improve their coding skills, please contact me.

Hoelaat begint de coderetreat precies? 
De website zegt: 9am to 5pm. De iCal export zegt van 10am to 6pm.
